channel.title: Server randomly crashes
channel.description: Well, im playing on a server, and the founder/owner just told me that the server randomly crashes, and he doesnt know why. He is one of the best coders i ever met. So its pretty wierd he cant fix that. Got any suggestions on how to solve the problem?

item.title: Server randomly crashes
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

  1. Open the source in an IDE.
  2. Is it client crashing the server? Maybe a packet is fucked?
    etc
    etc
